edu.doane.dugal.dea.kits.ichrom

Class PointMutation

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.doane.dugal.dea.kits.ichrom.PointMutation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Operator

    public class PointMutation
extends java.lang.Object
implements Operator
    Single-point mutation operator for integer chromosomes. The operator iterates through the population. Each individual is mutated with probability mu. If the individual is mutated, a random gene in it's chromosome is changed to a new number between the individual's lo and hi values.
    Version:
    12/30/2014
    Author:
    Mark M. Meysenburg
